data.title: Putting the Massive Losses in America’s 10 Largest Companies in Context
data.text: The bloodbath that created the major panic selling on Monday, March 9, 2020 was caused by a double-whammy of the continued spreading of the coronavirus outbreak coinciding with a fresh all-out oil price war between Russia and Saudi Arabia.

data.title: Why Credit Card Company Stocks Are Tanking
data.text: A recession won't be good news for spending. Nor will cheap oil, necessarily.

data.title: Visa partners with Paga on payments and fintech for Africa and abroad
data.text: Visa has entered a partnership with Nigeria based startup Paga on payments and technology. Founded in Lagos, Paga scaled its fintech business in West Africa, before targeting expansion in Ethiopia and Mexico.
